sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
What number should be added to each of the numbers \(10 \), \(19 \), \(26 \), and \(33 \) to make them proportional.
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "Lets suppose that the required number is $x $.

Since the numbers $10 + x $, $19 + x $, $26 + x $, $33 + x $ are in proportion, we have
\[
	\frac{\input[s1v1]{} + x }{19 + x } = \frac{\input[s1v2]{} + x }{33 + x }
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow (10 + x )(33 + x ) = (19 + x )(26 + x )
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow 330 + x (\input[s2v1]{} ) + x ^2 = 494 + x (\input[s2v2]{} ) + x ^2
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow x (43 - 45 ) = 494 - 330 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow x = \frac{494 - 330 }{43 - 45 }
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow x = \frac{\input[s3v1]{} }{\input[s3v2]{} }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow x = \frac{-82 }{1 }
\]
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [10, 26], "text": "$$\text{Four numbers are proportional when $a:b::c:d$, thus, using this result we get\[ \frac{10 + x }{19 + x } = \frac{26 + x }{33 + x }\]}$$"}, {"data": [43, 45], "text": " Upon cross- multiplication and further simplification we get \[
	x = \frac{494 - 330 }{43 - 45 }
\]"}, {"data": [164, -2], "text": "Further simplification will give us the result as \[x= \frac{-82 }{1 }\] "}]
